title.rendered: Data Science Intern at Centiro, Pune [Stipend Available] Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Online applications are invited for the Data Science Intern position at Centiro, Pune. Check the eligibility and other important details below!

About Centiro

Centiro is a Swedish software company with 650+ colleagues. Our solutions empower marquee brands and finer supply chains in 175+ countries. We believe in enabling and empowering commerce for companies with winning aspirations who seek to make a difference. The core focus is to connect and enable cloud-based delivery and service networks in the digital world. Centiro has received numerous awards and honours, including Great Place to Work® Legend and Sweden’s No. 1 Workplace in the Large Organizations category for 2021. Founded in 1998, with offices in Sweden, India, the UK, and the US.

Working at Centiro is different—inspiring, challenging, and rewarding. We are on a clear and rapid path of expansion and are looking for talents with a passion and drive to make a difference. Do you have the ability to see things from another perspective? Then you might be right for us. This is an exciting time to join the Centiro journey.

Job Summary

  • You will collect, process, analyze and interpret real-time data related to supply chain and logistics to reveal meaningful, actionable insights
  • You will analyze trends and reveal new business opportunities for our customers
  • You will create visuals and communicate the results to all stakeholders, internal and external
  • You will craft the best technological landscape for our current and future needs
  • You will work closely with our cross-functional teams of data scientists, software developers, application specialists and UX designers to create Machine Learning and AI solutions

Eligibility

You have an analytical mindset and love decoding data to tell a story. You know the potential of data and have a strong combination of analytical skills, intellectual curiosity and business acumen. You can communicate complex findings to non-technical colleagues or customers in an intriguing way

You have a University Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Business or Engineering.

Requirements

  • Programming skills (Python, SQL).
  • Statistical modeling and Machine learning (Gradient boosting, Neural networks, Natural Language Processing, Bayesian statistics)
  • Databases (SQL, NoSQL)
  • Data visualizations (Matplotlib, Google Data Studio)
  • Google Cloud Platform (e.g. AI notebooks and BigQuery).
  • Power BI
  • Time series analysis

Perks and benefits

We offer a professional, stimulating workplace in a company with an exciting future. We have a flat organizational structure with short decision pathways and accessible management. Our organization is based on participation, transparency and the drive to push the limits of what is possible. Our employees are dynamic and dedicated, combining a relaxed atmosphere with razor-sharp professionalism. We have plenty of career opportunities for the right people. We at Centiro value a good balance between work and leisure time. Applications will be processed on a continuous basis.

How to apply?

Eligible and interested candidates can apply for the Data Science Intern position at Centiro, Pune, via this link.

Location

Pune, India.
